name: fixelreorient
description:
Reorient fixel directions.

Reorientation is performed by transforming the vector representing the fixel direction with the Jacobian (local affine transform) computed at each voxel in the warp, then re-normalising the vector.

References:
author: David Raffelt (david.raffelt@florey.edu.au)

inputs.name: warp
inputs.description: a 4D deformation field used to perform reorientation. Reorientation is performed by applying the Jacobian affine transform in each voxel in the warp, then re-normalising the vector representing the fixel direction

inputs.name: fixel_out
inputs.description: the output fixel directory. If the the input and output directories are the same, the existing directions file will be replaced (providing the -force option is supplied). If a new directory is supplied then the fixel directions and all other fixel data will be copied to the new directory.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.
